amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the $607 million in funding for the operation and upgrading of Navy cruiser ships by $500 million and direct $235 million to defense health programs and to apply the remaining balance to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Other Procurement, Navy account by $506,660,000 and increase the Other Department of Defense Programs Defense Health Program account by $235,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 273 (Roll no. 475).
